entry.title: SAPSCRIPT window alignment changes to Language key
entry.content:
Hello SAP,

Can we modify alignment in SAPSCRIPT windows for different language other than original language. My company wants to modify a windows upper and height, only to Chinese Language instead of Original Language DE (Deutsch). 

A quick help is needed. Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SE16N value unconverted is empty.
entry.content:
I have added a new field LENUM to the structure ZSTRUC.
and this structure ZSTRUC is added to the table ZTABLE.

but after insert operation, unconverted value is shown as empty, sometimes even converted is empty.
It is very random, while on double click it's empty sometimes.
ref screenshot below:

What could be the reason, I have already adjusted in SE14 

Regards,
Shailesh

entry.title: smartforms text element - office interface crashes
entry.content:
Today I had to edit a Smart Forms. I opened a "text element." Word opened. I entered what I needed to do and closed the editor. Then the entire screen froze, and I couldn't do anything. Until yesterday, it worked perfectly. The only thing different is that yesterday my computer underwent Office updates.

I work on S4/HANA. I have SAP GUI 8.0 patch 5. I haven't had any problems for 18 months. From today, my screen froze. Could it have been the Office update that caused the problem? Thanks

entry.title: Add 'Net Due Interval 4' field in the 'Aging Grid of journal entry view of Account Receivables'
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Standard Fiori Application - Aging Grid of journal entry view of Account Receivables, have total 3 filters/parameters as 'Net Due Interval 1', 'Net Due Interval 2' and 'Net Due Interval 3'  which have default values as 30, 60 and 90 respectively.

Is it possible to add a new filter as a 'Net Due Interval 4' which will be having default value as 120 (editable)? (as shown in below screenshot)

My Observation - What I observed is, the existing fields 'Net Due Interval 1, 2 and 3 are coming from the underlying Interface CDS view - P_ARJrnlEntrItmAgingGrid1 . And by taking reference of 'Net Due Interval 1, 2 and 3', if we add the new field 'Net Due Interval 4' in this interface view by extending it then we have to add this field in all the other Interface Views and final consumption view also. Below are those standard cds views which needs to be extended to accommodate the new field 'Net Due Interval 4' - 

1) P_ARJrnlEntrItmAgingGrid1 --> 1st Interface view to be extended 
2) P_ARJrnlEntrItmAgingGrid2 
3) P_ARJrnlEntrItmAgingGrid3 --> Here need to update the existing logic to calculate 'NetDueInterval' field with respect to 'Net Due Interval 4'
4) P_ARJrnlEntrItmAgingGrid4 --> Need to update the logic for fields 'Net Due Interval Amount 1, 2, 3 & 4' because 'NetDueInterval' (which is calculated in above cds view) is used in the calculation of those amount fields.
5) I_ARJrnlEntrItmAgingGrid --> This is Cube View
6) C_ARJrnlEntrItmAgingGrid --> This is Final Consumption view or Analytics Query View

Also I have observed that, the existing AR Aging report is giving correct result when I enter value 120 days in the 'Net Due Interval 3' for my requirement to calculate for 120 days interval.

Now, please guide -->

1) Is it possible to add 'Net Due Interval 4' field in the standard AR Aging Report?

2) If YES, then please validate my above observation i.e. we have to extend total 6 standard CDS views to add this new field.

3) In views 'P_ARJrnlEntrItmAgingGrid3' and 'P_ARJrnlEntrItmAgingGrid4' --> we have to update existing logic to calculate 'NetDueInterval' and 'Net Due Interval Amount 1, 2, 3 & 4' respectively. Is this is correct i.e. to update existing fields logic while doing CDS Extend?

4) If No, then shall we proceed by entering 120 days in 'Net Due Interval 3' which is giving us the correct the result?

Note - My system is S4HANA on Premise >> Release 2021 .

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Update RFQ (ME42) via BAPI / ABAP
entry.content:
Hello,

I want to update my custom field of a RFQ with bsart 'AN'.

How can I achieve it. I don't want to use batch input of ME41 because the field is not visible in this transaction.

Thanks for your help.

entry.title: Need Free Study Materials and Resources for C_ABAPD_2507 (ABAP Cloud Developer Certification)
entry.content:
Hello Everyone, 

I‚Äôm currently preparing for the **C_ABAPD_2507 ‚Äì SAP Certified Associate ‚Äì ABAP Cloud** certification exam and I‚Äôm looking for **free materials or resources** to help with my preparation.

Could anyone please share:
- Links to **free study materials**, **blogs**, or **videos** related to ABAP Cloud?
- Any **practice questions** or **sample tests** available on SAP Learning Hub (free edition) or SAP Community?
- Tips on which **topics to focus on**, such as **CDS views**, **RAP model**, **ABAP RESTful programming**, **ABAP on BTP**, or **Fiori integration**?

Also, if anyone who has already cleared this exam can share their **study plan or experience**, that would be really helpful.

Thank you in advance for your support and guidance! 

@ABAP Cloud

@ABAP Development 

@ SAP Certification 

@Learning Journey 

@C_ABAPD_250

**Best regards,**
*Arsath Deen*

entry.title: In the ALV display the onclick does not work after sorting
entry.content:
Hello,

I am using cl salv method to display an internal table in alv format. The display is working as expected and the onclick method also works fine when clicked on the contract number. 

But after sorting the columns the onclick still picks up the row value not the value the user has clicked on.

entry.title: SAP ABAP : Field Name is variable.
entry.content:
Hi experts, 

„ÄêT1„Äë

„ÄêT2„Äë

„ÄêT3„Äë

The meaning of T1 is that , if comp = '1000',   the value of field F1 and F3 would be checked.

According to  T1 :  if t3-F1 = t2-F1 and t3-F3 = t2-F3, then T3-F5 = 'Y'.

The result is : the F5 of date 1101 =  'Y'.

My Question is how to achieve this with SAP ABAP ?

Tks.

entry.title: VA01 Create With Reference Quotation Change Enhancement
entry.content:
Hi Guys,

We have a requirement to modify the reference quotation during sales order creation in VA01. If the quotation entered is incorrect, it needs to be replaced with the correct one through an enhancement.

I‚Äôve already reviewed the following user exits:

  1. USEREXIT_FIELD_MODIFICATION 
  2.  USEREXIT_MOVE_FIELD_TO_VBAP
  3. USEREXIT_MOVE_FIELD_TO_VBAK

These exits can be used to change screen fields with the updated quotation data; however, that would require extensive work.
Is there any enhancement point or user exit available where we can modify the quotation number before the system retrieves its data and populates the screen?

Thanks,

Praveen.

entry.title: using BAPI_PO_CHANGE to change the Delivery date schedule delivery date and validity end date
entry.content: While using BAPI_PO_CHANGE to change the deliverydate, schedule delivery date and Validity end date for a PO, The release strategy related fields are set to blocked when earlier it was fully released. And when released only from buyer, I'm getting authorization workflow is in progress error and the data is not changed. Is there a way to bypass this release reset logic so that the release related fields won't be changed when I make changes in the delivery dates?

entry.title: How can I remove the attachment of a file in QM06_FM_TASK_SEND_PAPER_ATTACH
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a request where I need to get rid of the attachment which is automatically attached to the email sent in Q2 type of notifications ( QM02 ).

Even if I skip by debug the FM SO_DOC_INSERT_WITH_ORIG_API1, it still attaching the file.

I have tried everything but cannot get rid of this attachment. I want to leave all the rest of the functionality as it is.

Regards.

entry.title: Help with Retrieving Modified Condition Values in IF_EX_ME_PROCESS_PO_CUST~CHECK Method
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I‚Äôm working on customizing the procurement process and I‚Äôm facing an issue when trying to retrieve the modified condition values from the screen in the IF_EX_ME_PROCESS_PO_CUST~CHECK method.

Issue:

I want to get the condition values of the line items after they have been modified on the screen in ME22N. However, when I call get_conditions in the CHECK method, the values I retrieve are still the original (pre-modification) values, not the updated ones.

METHOD if_ex_me_process_po_cust~check.
  DATA: ls_header TYPE mepoheader,
        lo_data_item TYPE REF TO if_purchase_order_item_mm,
        lt_conditions TYPE mmpur_tkomv,
        ls_condition TYPE komv.  

  IF im_header IS NOT INITIAL.
    CALL METHOD im_header->get_items RECEIVING re_items = lt_items_data.
  
    LOOP AT lt_items_data INTO ls_items_data.
      lo_data_item = ls_items_data-item.
      
      CALL METHOD lo_data_item->get_conditions
        IMPORTING
          ex_conditions = lt_conditions.
    ENDLOOP.

  ENDIF.
ENDMETHOD.

entry.title: HR_INFOTYPE_OPERATION is not inserting infotype 0014 data
entry.content:

I am using HR_INFOTYPE_OPERATION to insert the records. It shows success and no errors in return.

But the IT0014 records not created in the master data.

1. BAPI_EMPLOYEE_ENQUEUE

2.HR_PSBUFFER_INITIALIZE 

3. HR_INFOTYPE_OPERATION

4.BAPI_EMPLOYEE_DEQUEUE 

Any suggestions ?

Thanks,

Shabbir

entry.title: Adding Additional field in MB51 Report
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

Requirement is to add BRGEW, NTGEW, GEWEI field to MB51 Report. I add the those fields to MSEG table using append structure like ZBRGEW, ZNTGEW, ZGEWEI. I implement the implict enhancement in RM07DOCS.  But in mb51 output those fields are not shown. Here with i share the implict enhancement for reference.

In RM07DOCS Static Enhancement Point Section  PR:RM07DOCS DA:LIST SE:END EI  - wrote the logic like

DATA: ZBRGEW TYPE MARA-BRGEW,
      ZNTGEW TYPE MARA-NTGEW,
      ZGEWEI TYPE MARA-GEWEI.

RM07DOCS Dynamic Enhancement Point Section  PR:RM07DOCS FO:OUTPUT_LIST SE:BEGIN EI  - wrote the logic like

TYPES: BEGIN OF TY_T1,
       BRGEW TYPE BRGEW,
       NTGEW TYPE NTGEW,
       GEWEI TYPE GEWEI,
       END OF TY_T1.
DATA: IT_MAT TYPE TABLE OF TY_T1.

FIELD-SYMBOLS: <LFS_MAT> TYPE TY_T1.

DATA:  lt_itab1 LIKE list[].
FIELD-SYMBOLS : <lfs_itab> like LINE OF lt_itab1.
lt_itab1[] = list[].
if lt_itab1 is NOT INITIAL.
  SELECT BRGEW NTGEW GEWEI from mara INTO TABLE IT_MAT FOR ALL ENTRIES IN lt_itab1
    WHERE matnr = lt_itab1-matnr.
     if sy-subrc eq 0.

  LOOP at lt_itab1 ASSIGNING <lfs_itab>.
     <lfs_itab>-ZBRGEW = <lfs_MAT>-BRGEW.
     <lfs_itab>-ZNTGEW = <lfs_MAT>-NTGEW.
     <lfs_itab>-ZGEWEI = <lfs_MAT>-GEWEI.
    ENDLOOP.
       ENDIF.
  ENDIF.

RM07DOCS Dynamic Enhancement Point Section PR:RM07DOCS FO:FIELDS_FOR_SELECTION SE:END EI - wrote the logic like

APPEND 'MSEG~ZBRGEW' TO g_t_fields.
  APPEND 'MSEG~ZNTGEW' TO g_t_fields.
  APPEND 'MSEG~ZGEWEI' TO g_t_fields.
*
  APPEND 'MSEG~ZBRGEW' TO g_t_fields_new.
  APPEND 'MSEG~ZNTGEW' TO g_t_fields_new.
  APPEND 'MSEG~ZGEWEI' TO g_t_fields_new.

RM07DOCS Dynamic Enhancement Point Section PR:RM07DOCS FO:BUILD_RUNTIMETABLE SE:END EI - wrote the logic

rx'MSEG ZBRGEW                          00 00'.
  rx'MSEG ZNTGEW                          00 00'.
  rx'MSEG ZGEWEI                          00 00'.

Advance Thanks.
